statements: SELECT * FROM customer_bookings WHERE booking_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, tour_location, payment_amount FROM customer_bookings WHERE payment_amount > 100;
SELECT * FROM customer_bookings WHERE tour_location = 'Paris' ORDER BY tour_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, tour_date FROM customer_bookings WHERE tour_location LIKE '%beach%' ORDER BY tour_date ASC;
SELECT booking_id, customer_name, tour_location, payment_amount FROM customer_bookings WHERE tour_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customer_bookings WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY booking_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, tour_location FROM customer_bookings WHERE tour_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT booking_id, customer_name, payment_amount FROM customer_bookings WHERE tour_location LIKE '%Beach%' ORDER BY payment_amount DESC, booking_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_bookings WHERE payment_amount <= 500 AND tour_location = 'Mountains' AND customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY tour_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, tour_date, payment_amount FROM customer_bookings WHERE payment_amount > 500 AND tour_location IN ('City', 'Historical Site') ORDER BY tour_location, tour_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE tour_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY tour_date DESC;
SELECT booking_id, tour_date, tour_time, booking_amount FROM bookings WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(booking_amount) AS total_amount FROM bookings GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 500;
SELECT c.name, b.tour_date FROM customers c INNER JOIN bookings b ON c.customer_id = b.customer_id WHERE b.tour_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT b.* FROM bookings b WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM customers c WHERE c.customer_id = b.customer_id);
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE tour_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT booking_id, payment_id, amount FROM payments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_phone LIKE '555%';
SELECT customer_name, booking_status FROM customers JOIN bookings ON customers.customer_id = bookings.customer_id WHERE bookings.tour_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, customer_name FROM customers JOIN bookings ON customers.customer_id = bookings.customer_id WHERE bookings.booking_status = 'Confirmed';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM bookings WHERE booking_status = 'Pending');
SELECT * FROM customer;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customer WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT tour_name, tour_price FROM tour WHERE tour_price > 100;
SELECT booking_date, tour_id FROM booking ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customer;
SELECT booking_id, customer_id, booking_date FROM booking ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT tour_name, tour_description FROM tour WHERE tour_price > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payment WHERE payment_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY payment_id ASC;
SELECT customer.customer_name, tour.tour_name, payment.payment_amount FROM customer JOIN booking ON customer.customer_id = booking.customer_id JOIN payment ON booking.booking_id = payment.booking_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT customer_id, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT * FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, tour_id, booking_date, payment_date FROM bookings JOIN payments ON bookings.booking_id = payments.booking_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%' AND email LIKE 'example%' ORDER BY first_name, last_name;
SELECT tour_name, duration_hours, difficulty_level FROM tours WHERE duration_hours > 5 ORDER BY difficulty_level ASC, duration_hours DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT b.booking_id, c.first_name AS customer_first_name, t.tour_name AS booked_tour, p.amount AS payment_amount FROM bookings b JOIN customers c ON b.customer_id = c.customer_id JOIN tours t ON b.tour_id = t.tour_id JOIN payments p ON b.booking_id = p.booking_id WHERE p.payment_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';

SELECT e.employee_id, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.position, COUNT(b.booking_id) AS total_bookings FROM employees e LEFT JOIN bookings b ON e.employee_id = b.customer_id GROUP BY e.employee_id, e.first_name, e.last_name, e.position ORDER BY total_bookings DESC;
